    public class TrackerViewManager
extends AbstractEntityManagerImpl
    Business Layer tracker view management.

      • getTrackerViewCriteria

        public Criteria getTrackerViewCriteria(UserDto user,
                              TrackerViewDto view,
                              TrackerLayoutDto layout,
                              Criteria criteria)
        Get the database query criteria for the specified tracker view
        Parameters:
        user - that wants to query tracker items via this view
        view - whose query criteria to get
        layout - of the tracker whose items to query, or null to use the view's entity layout
        criteria - where to add the view criterions, or null to create and return new Criteria
        Returns:
        the database query criteria for the specified tracker view

      • getTrackerViewOrderBy

        public com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.util.TrackerItemFieldComparator getTrackerViewOrderBy(TrackerViewDto view,
                                                                                       TrackerLayoutDto layout,
                                                                                       Criteria criteria)
        Parse the sorting definition of the specified view for the specified tracker layout
        Parameters:
        view - whose sorting to parse
        layout - of the target tracker whose items to sort
        criteria - (optional) where to add sort order definitions
        Returns:
        the parsed TrackerItemFieldComparator chain

      • getTrackerViewCharts

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTrackerViewCharts(UserDto user,
                                                    java.util.Locale locale,
                                                    TrackerDto tracker,
                                                    TrackerViewDto view,
                                                    TrackerLayoutDto layout)
        Get the Wiki markup for the charts/reports configured for the specified view, which should have TrackerViewDto.DASHBOARD_LAYOUT
        Parameters:
        user - to check access permissions
        locale - for localization of chart titles and descriptions
        tracker - is the current tracker whose statistics/charts to show
        view - with TrackerViewDto.DASHBOARD_LAYOUT whose TrackerViewDto.getAdvancedCriteria() contains the chart definitions
        layout - of the current tracker to configure the charts/reports for
        Returns:
        a List of the charts/reports Wiki markup configured for the specified view

      • getViewSelection

        public java.util.List<? extends DescribeableDto> getViewSelection(UserDto user,
                                                         java.lang.Integer entityId,
                                                         java.lang.Integer viewTypeId)
        Get the available views of the specified type for the specified entity
        Parameters:
        user - to find private and public views
        entityId - of the view entity
        viewTypeId - is the type of the views to get
        Returns:
        the views of the specified type for the specified entity visible to the user

      • getViewSelection

        public java.util.List<? extends DescribeableDto> getViewSelection(UserDto user,
                                                         java.lang.Integer entityId,
                                                         java.lang.Integer viewTypeId,
                                                         java.util.Collection<?> groups)
        Get the available views of the specified type for the specified entity
        Parameters:
        user - to find private and public views
        entityId - of the view entity
        viewTypeId - is the type of the views to get
        groups - is a List of the layout types to filter and to group the result
        Returns:
        the views of the specified type for the specified entity visible to the user
        Since:
        CB-6.0
